name: The Story of the Elevator Operator who arrived at the Garden
name_original: The Story of the Elevator Operator who arrived at the Garden
description:
To play online please visit http://fserb.com/elop/

A man from Edmonton with a giant orange head walks into a bar, he says "today was my first day on the job as an elevator operator and all I want to do is to move people. But they don't understand me, and I don't understand them."
The bartender asks him what he will have to drink.
The guy says he'll buy a round of beers for everyone.
Everyone is super stoked.

Art by Palgal
Programming by Fernando Serboncini
Music by Morpheus Monmynoi
